data.title: Bob Franklin - Because Time is Timeless
data.meta_description: Forty minutes of stand-up from a multiple award-winning comedy legend, a thirty year veteran of stage, film and TV. "Surreal, inspired lunacy" The List, Glasgow and Edinburgh âRazor sharp subversive social commentaryâ www.thescene.com âChoc full of clever wordplay and well-constructed jokesâ The Age âLike an ancient alchemist, Franklin knows how to blend comedy and the weird in just the right amountsâ The Herald Sun âIn this brilliantly executed piece of theatre, Franklin manages to expertly walk the line between reality and fictionâ The Live Review "Keenly observed...uniformly superb" Beat Magazine
data.text:
Forty minutes of stand-up from a multiple award-winning comedy legend, a thirty year veteran of stage, film and TV.

"Surreal, inspired lunacy" The List, Glasgow and Edinburgh

âRazor sharp subversive social commentaryâ www.thescene.com

âChoc full of clever wordplay and well-constructed jokesâ The Age

âLike an ancient alchemist, Franklin knows how to blend comedy and the weird in just the right amountsâ The Herald Sun

âIn this brilliantly executed piece of theatre, Franklin manages to expertly walk the line between reality and fictionâ The Live Review

"Keenly observed...uniformly superb" Beat Magazine
